name: GAME1 Scarbro JRL 322
description:
Story

The player has taken a wrong turn on their walk to class and has been transported into what looks to be, a wonderland universe. They player is greeted by a worm like creature that tells them what they need to do, to return home. The character must find their way through the maze of the forest to find another earthly human, “Alice,” who can help them get transported back to their universe. The character must defeat the Queen’s Knights in order to get through the forest and make sure they stay on the beaten path to not get too lost. 

Game Play

Players will choose to start the game. A pop up screen will tell them the objective of the game. The pop up screen will include a worm like character, greeting them and telling them how to find their way through the game. They will be warned of the Queen’s Knights and their possible interference. Players will be transported to a wide shot view of the maze. There they will use their keyboard arrows to move their character across the maze to find an exit, where they will meet “Alice” and be transported home, winning the game. Within the maze there will be several Queen of Hearts Knights attempting to block entrance further. Players will have to jump on them to defeat and pass by. Players will use the space bar to make their character jump.  If players run into a knight without jumping, they will be defeated, ending the game.
